definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
erhua variant of 打盹[da3 dun3]

sentences.english: He dozed off in the armchair.
sentences.chinese: 他坐在扶手椅裏打盹兒。

sentences.english: Along the stone corridor of the battlement , two figures were slouched down against the wall.
sentences.chinese: 沿着城垛的石頭通道我看到有兩個人靠在城牆上打盹。

sentences.english: Driving time could be given over to working, snoozing or browsing the web.
sentences.chinese: 開車的時間可以用於工作，打盹或上網衝浪。

sentences.english: Odd sleep patterns increase the danger of napping through a snack or mealtime.
sentences.chinese: 不規律的睡眠會增加加餐或者喫飯時間打盹的危險。

sentences.english: Some scientists think that people should also take catnaps .
sentences.chinese: 一些科學家認爲人也應該打盹。

sentences.english: On riverbanks capy baras the world's largest rodents snooze.
sentences.chinese: 在河畔，水豚，全世界最大的齧齒類動物，正在打盹。

sentences.english: No child dozed with Misty in the room.
sentences.chinese: 米斯迪在教室的時候沒有學生打盹。

sentences.english: The soda made the goddess nod by the fishing rod.
sentences.chinese: 蘇打使女神在釣竿旁打盹英語口語人機對話。

sentences.english: It was necessary, therefore, to invent instruments that neither slumbered nor slept.
sentences.chinese: 因此，有必要發明一種儀器，既不打盹，也不睡覺。

sentences.english: The sound of the swinging churn rocked Mrs. Thompson first into a gentle doze.
sentences.chinese: 攪乳器晃動的聲音首先使得湯普生太太微微打盹。

sentences.english: A lot of famous people take catnaps during the day.
sentences.chinese: 許多名人一天總要打盹。

sentences.english: My nap experience was no different than if I took a nap while following a common monophasic sleep pattern.
sentences.chinese: 我在單相睡眠的時候，如果打盹也是類似的感覺。

sentences.english: If you doze, it eats you up.
sentences.chinese: 你一打盹兒，它就會吃了你。

sentences.english: When you are old and gray and full of sleep and nodding by the fire.
sentences.chinese: 當你老了，滿頭白髮，昏昏沉沉在爐火旁打盹。

sentences.english: But the next time your baby has a nap, watch what you say.
sentences.chinese: 但下一次在寶寶打盹時，請注意你聊天時說的話。

sentences.english: Female polar bear Aika dozes in Berlin Zoo.
sentences.chinese: 柏林動物園裏的北極母熊艾卡正在打盹。

definition: erhua variant of 打盹[da3 dun3]
to doze/to take a nap/nodding off to sleep
to relax with one's eyes closed
to sleep soundly/to fall into a deep sleep
to rest for a bit/to take a breather
